etymology.description: 如(如) (rú, "as; like") + 果(果) (guǒ, "fruit; result") = "if; in the case of"
etymology.interpretation: The word 如果(如果) (rúguǒ, "if") combines 如(如) (rú, "as; like") with 果(果) (guǒ, "result"), suggesting a conditional relationship similar to 'as a result.' It frames hypothetical scenarios by indicating the potential outcomes that could follow from a given situation.

examples.chinese: 如果你有时间(如果你有時間)，请来参加我们的聚会(請來參加我們的聚會)。
examples.pinyin: rúguǒ nǐ yǒu shíjiān, qǐng lái cānjiā wǒmen de jùhuì.
examples.english: If you have time, please come to our party.

examples.chinese: 如果明天下雨(如果明天下雨)，我们就取消计划(我們就取消計劃)。
examples.pinyin: rúguǒ míngtiān xiàyǔ, wǒmen jiù qǔxiāo jìhuà.
examples.english: If it rains tomorrow, we will cancel the plan.

examples.chinese: 如果有困难(如果有困難)，请随时告诉我(請隨時告訴我)。
examples.pinyin: rúguǒ yǒu kùnnán, qǐng suíshí gàosù wǒ.
examples.english: If you have difficulties, please let me know at any time.
